alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lolo National Forest, Welcome Creek And Scapegoat Wildernesses; Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness; Salish and Kootenai Indian Reservation; Western Lolo National Forest (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 02 at 3:15AM MDT until August 02 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * Affected area: Fire Zone 105 (Flathead/Glacier Park). Fire Zone 106 (West Lolo). Fire Zone 107 (Flathead Reservation). Fire Zone 108 (East Lolo). * Impacts: The combination of gusty winds, low humidity, and an unstable atmosphere will result in critical fire weather conditions Tuesday afternoon and evening. * Winds: West winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts around 30 to 35 mph. * Minimum humidities: 10 to 15 percent &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lolo National Forest, Welcome Creek And Scapegoat Wildernesses; Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness; Salish and Kootenai Indian Reservation; Western Lolo National Forest
